name: Rouge (yekko)
description:
Rouge is a game about a little rouge rogue who fell into an underground tunnel below their house. Will you be able to unravel the mystery within this place? Oh, and no, it's not supposed to say rogue.

W A S and D to move. Click to attack.

Press I to enter your inventory. Click items to hold them. While holding an item press E to equip it. Hover over it and press E to un-equip it.

M to open quick menu.

Press F to activate certain abilities.
